World starts welcoming New Year with fireworks, prayers and some stark wordsNew Zealanders were among the first in the world to celebrate the arrival of 2024 with a fireworks display in Auckland on Monday. The fireworks illuminated the cloudy night sky and were accompanied by a laser light and animation show. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 15:21:04 GMT RWN3APH3PBJKLNME7FPKYX2KLI https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/world-starts-welcoming-new-year-with-fireworks-prayers-some-stark-words-2023-12-31/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
Putin makes passing Ukraine reference in New Year's Eve addressRussian President Vladimir Putin, facing an election in March, made only passing reference in his New Year address on Sunday to his war in Ukraine, hailing his soldiers as heroes but mostly emphasising unity and shared determination. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 14:21:57 GMT JNWGOU3YF5JFNKSXBO5WKDXSXA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-new-year-address-makes-only-passing-reference-ukraine-2023-12-31/Reuters世界欧洲
Benedict would have banned same-sex blessings, aide says on anniversaryThe Vatican marked the first anniversary on Sunday of the death of Pope Benedict XVI, with one of his closest aides saying he never would have approved a recent declaration allowing Catholic priests to bless same-sex couples. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 13:47:41 GMT MVUHADVVPZL4LIBAHLIT2EHEJM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/benedict-would-have-banned-same-sex-blessings-aide-says-anniversary-2023-12-31/Philip Pullella世界欧洲
Xi says China to consolidate and enhance economic recovery in 2024President Xi Jinping said on Sunday that China will consolidate and enhance the positive trend of its economic recovery in 2024, and sustain long-term economic development with deeper reforms. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 12:31:40 GMT BYGCFZFPJBJJZHE6J755VPMHFI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/xi-says-china-consolidate-enhance-economic-recovery-2024-2023-12-31/Reuters世界中国
Israel says it's ready to let ships bring aid to GazaIsrael is prepared to let ships deliver aid to the war-ravaged Gaza Strip "immediately" as part of a proposed sea corridor from Cyprus, the Israeli foreign minister said on Sunday, naming four European countries as potential participants. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 11:29:55 GMT YJVLJB6KLZJZZOBFH5QXUTJZXE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-ready-let-ships-bring-aid-gazas-shores-minister-2023-12-31/Dan Williams世界中东
Struggling Caracas restaurants, bars offer tour to boost salesSeveral bars and restaurants in Venezuela's capital Caracas are offering an eight-hour tour where customers visit each establishment in a bid to boost low sales at a time of persistent inflation. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 11:17:04 GMT GTZG2E2HIBOBTMZWJ7UKWKCP7A https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/struggling-caracas-restaurants-bars-offer-tour-boost-sales-2023-12-31/Efrain Otero世界美洲
Israeli government approves appointment of new foreign ministerThe Israeli government on Sunday approved the appointment of a new foreign minister to replace Eli Cohen, who will become energy minister as part of a pre-arranged ministerial rotation, a government statement said. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 10:52:46 GMT 57CGDMZNNFKVZELIFOZBXZYZ4U https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-government-approves-appointment-new-foreign-minister-2023-12-31/Reuters世界中东
Houthi militants attack container ship, Maersk halts Red Sea sailingU.S. helicopters sank three of the boats that attacked the Maersk container vessel, with no survivors. Houthi militants have been targeting ships in the Red Sea to show their support for Hamas as the Islamist group fights Israel in the Gaza Strip. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 10:33:55 GMT HKYZZA4F5BJ4DOFVZP7AH4EBUU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/maersk-pauses-red-sea-sailings-after-houthi-attack-container-ship-2023-12-31/Jacob Gronholt-Pedersen, Ahmed Elimam世界中东
Congo President Tshisekedi re-elected - election commissionDemocratic Republic of Congo's President Felix Tshisekedi has been re-elected for a second term after getting more than 73% of the vote in this month's presidential election, the country's election commission said on Sunday. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 08:53:36 GMT Y7OMPNDA2BL6PJJRCLOZOJ2NH4 https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/congo-release-provisional-results-disputed-presidential-vote-2023-12-31/Ange Kasongo世界非洲
Final bodies found after China's most serious earthquake in a decadeThe bodies of the two remaining people missing in the aftermath of China's most serious earthquake in nearly a decade were found on Sunday, a tragedy that has renewed concern over exposed populations in seismically active zones. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 07:01:58 GMT JEWSD2DZINJ27A6J5ER54QENHU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/final-bodies-found-after-chinas-most-serious-earthquake-decade-2023-12-31/Reuters世界中国
Kharkiv strikes were retaliation for Belgorod attack, Russia saysKharkiv officials said that at least six missiles hit the city, injuring dozens of people and damaging buildings, followed by waves of drone attacks on housing blocks. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 05:42:13 GMT Z3F6EEZT7FKLRGEMK3AZXVATBA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/toll-ukraine-air-strikes-Russias-belgorod-rises-22-officials-say-2023-12-31/Reuters世界欧洲
